app.containers.AboutPage.mission: The Girl Manual is a safe space to discuss all of those things that come with being a woman. From feminism, to the workplace, through female friendship and dating, to gender stereotypes and domestic violence. A podcast, blog, community, and knowledge hub of everything related to the women experience.
app.containers.AboutPage.motivation: We are Essi and Fernanda, two girls trying to understand the social dynamics around womanhood, one conversation at a time. The Girl Manual was created as part of a quest for equality by two feminists, that are frankly quite tired of being told that girls should be nice, pretty and quiet. So join us in the creation of The Girl Manual while having fun, important, and sometimes awkward conversations.
app.containers.AboutPage.title: Our mission
app.containers.ConfirmationPage.header: Thanks for joining. We are glad you are here!!
app.containers.ContactPage.contact.name: Name
app.containers.ContactPage.helpUs.header: Help us write The Girl Manual
app.containers.ContactPage.helpUs.text: If you have notes, feedback, jokes, or experiences you want to share with us, send us an email to contact@thegirlmanual.com or tweet us @girlmanualpod We can‚Äôt wait to hear your stories!
app.containers.ContactPage.sub.disclaime: We may use your Personal Information to contact you with newsletters and other information that may be of interest to you. You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link. We will never share your Personal Information with Third Parties.
app.containers.ContactPage.sub.message: Receive monthly insights into ‚ÄúThe Girl Manual‚Äù
app.containers.DonatePage.donate.header: Be part of The Girl Manual
app.containers.DonatePage.donate.text: If you love the Girl Manual as much as we do, you can be a part of it as a sponsor, donor or contributor. We will be happy to receive any questions you might have on sponsorships, donations, or any other inquiries at contact@thegirlmanual.com.
app.containers.HomePage.essi.bio: Essi is a Bachelor of Political Science and Master of Violin Performance. She currently works at the heart of EU decision-making and has followed topics from social and health policy to equality and women's rights. Before politics she worked as a freelancer violinist with the London Philharmonic Orchestra.
app.containers.HomePage.essi.powers: Powers: Bachelor in Political Science + Master in Violin Performance
app.containers.HomePage.essi.title: Policy Advisor
app.containers.HomePage.fernanda.bio: Fernanda is a Master of Public Policy by Sciences Po (Paris), and Bachelor of Communications by Universidad Iberoamericana (CDMX). Has been part of multiple projects as communication consultant and doing research on innovation policy, restorative justice, and gender.
app.containers.HomePage.fernanda.powers: Powers: Master in Public Policy + Bachelor in Communications
app.containers.HomePage.fernanda.title: Writer
app.containers.HomePage.headline:
Feminism, friendship, equality
and other girl stuff.
app.containers.HomePage.hostsHeadline: ‚ÄúThe Girl Manual‚Äù podcast is hosted by Fernanda Zamora and Essi Kiiski.
